column8: Our Tru-Bamboo comes in a variety of shades and hues, and also presents a very pleasing pattern created by the alternating banded pattern that is naturally produced by its nodes.  The process of carbonization makes it possible to obtain bamboo in light, natural and dark shades. Different kinds of wood stains and varnishes can also be used to make it the desired colour. Bamboo floors will suit all kinds of design schemes. They are suited to tropical or Zen-inspired interiors, but they will also work for an ultra-modern theme or one that incorporates some vintage colonial elements.
column9:
All Tru-Bamboo is cold pressed creating a stronger resistance to deformation of the boards and a richer variety of colour from plank to plank. The Cold press method of production provides an extremely stable product that is more suitable to Australia’s harsh conditions!
Bamboo flooring is also considered to be eco friendly as it is classified as a grass which it means it grows at a rapid rate. Bamboo floors have a strong strength and durability and are resistant to insects and have better resistant to moisture than other wood floors.
column22: This type of flooring can be floated over any level hard surface throughout your home. (except Wet areas) A floating floor requires an expansion gap to be left around the perimeter of the room and to any solid obstructions. Floating floors can be installed over existing direct stuck vinyl floors and some tiled floors also. Please refer to the manufacturers guide for further instructions.
column23: Standard 2mm Foam or Acoustic and Moisture barrier required
column37: Like all floating floors you should only lightly Mop your floor without leaving any excess water on it. A constant humidty level of around 55-65% relative air humity is best to preserve the value of and to care for your floor. We also recommend mats at all doorways to avoid sand and dirt being walked onto the flooring. Further maintainence guides are available on the manufacturers web site.

column8:
You simply cannot do anything wrong with classics, besides which
you can prove that you have a taste that sets you apart from the
masses. Laminate flooring floors from the Classic collection are, as
the name suggests, the classics by Parador. They are distinguished
by their exquisite yet unassumingly timeless look and a touch of
luxurious elegance. The Classic floors in block and wideplank look
offer plenty of scope for design, which goes with many styles. The
Classic range offers different qualities for every requirement, is suitable
for many different areas of use and can be beautifully combined
both with classical and modern style elements. Parador Laminate
Flooring Classic is the fi rst and best choice for all those who want to
furnish their homes to the highest classical standards and steer clear
of changing fashions.
column9: Parador offers premium quality “Made in Germany”. Our many years of experience provides the foundation for this combined with the relentless drive to further develop our expertise in all relevant areas. Our customers can tell the quality of our laminate floors by the brilliance of our decors as well as by the particularly good anti-swelling behaviour of the core boards and the perfect click connections. These properties characterise the faultless appearance of the Parador installation over the long term.
column10:
The elaborately reproduced decor papers based on organic dyes
are made with innovative printing methods and guarantee an unsurpassed
brilliance of colour. The latest computer-controlled profiling
machines ensure the highest fitting accuracy and thus enable a
perfect click connection, which guarantees a joint that is almost
imperceptible to the eye. This creates a uniform look, whilst dirt and
damp are less able to penetrate the floor, making cleaning considerably
easier. In order to be able to guarantee these and other qualities
for every single plank of laminate flooring, the whole production
process is continually subject to quality control procedures.

Floating floors can be installed over existing direct stuck vinyl floors and some tiled floors also. Please refer to the manufacturers guide for further instructions.

column30: Highly wear resistant top layer made of melamine resin overlay

A constant humidty level of around 55-65% relative air humity is best to preserve the value of and to care for your floor. We also recommend mats at all doorways to avoid sand and dirt being walked onto the flooring. Further maintainence guides are available on the manufacturers web site.

column8:
Parador laminate flooring Trendtime interprets contemporary furnishing
trends. The range includes authentic imitations of quality timbers all in many
different plank formats, surface textures and a four sided V joint groove. The ideal basis
for a design-oriented furnishing style.
column9:
Laminate flooring has long since freed itself from its natural predecessors, engineered wood and solid
wood flooring – not least because of its high resilience and easy maintenance, which also makes it
suitable for heavy duty demands in intensively used rooms. These days laminate flooring is experiencing a
higher level of appreciation than ever and is seen as a worthy alternative to real wood floors. Laminate
flooring from Parador is accorded a special role in this development. Due to our wealth of experience with
wood and the latest technical expertise, we are in a position to produce authentic interpretations of high
quality timbers and also transform other classic materials like stone and concrete into laminate flooring
realistically.

column8:
Wood Effect Luxury vinyl planks are a great alternative to your traditional sheet vinyl flooring.
From light oaks to modern silver greys Wood Effects
is a high quality domestic and
commercial Luxury Vinyl Plank to give you a
superior finish. All 8 decors have an
embossed finish to highlight the wood
grains and create a realistic look. Each plank has a micro bevel edge
and is coated with Nano Silver & Micro-
Ceramic coatings to protect your
investment for years to come.
column9:
3mm thick for Stability .5mm wear layer
Nano Silver coating with
Anti-microbial protection
Minimal expansion
Micro bevel edge
column10: We recommend a professional installer be used to install this product.
column22: These 3mm luxury vinyl tiles need to be direct stuck to a suitable subfloor with the appropriatte vinyl glue adhesive. The subfloor must be clean level and free of any paints or solovents. Wood effects can be laid in most areas of the home as it is highly moisture resistant.
column24: Direct stick to a suitable subfloor
column35: All area's of the home or small office
column36: All area's of the home or small office
column37: WOOD EFFECTS LVT has various colors and pattern choices and a number of advantages such as outstanding durability and comfortable viewpoint of walk. It also has these features of easy application and maintenance, but regular cleaning and up-keeping is required to maintain the product correctly..Please read the instructions on a bottle of Loba Care avaliable through this web site.
